1.0.name: wordpress/metatag
1.0.description:
Yet another WordPress SEO plugin to enhance on page SEO of your website.

It provides a simple to use interface to enter your meta tags like meta descriptions and keywords. The tags will automatically inserted into your website header while a visitor or search engine bot visit your website. This will enhance your presence to search engines and will work with you to increase your visitors.

Upcoming features: * Automatic meta tag generator * A nice Admin panel * Support for custom post type

If you have further query, contact me
